attributes.action: Create a law to ban the sale of birds in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Keeping birds as pets is un-regulated and results in birds being kept in cages too small to fly for the majority of their lives.  It also contributes to the import of illegal bird types.  Keeping birds is unnecessary and cruel and we would like to see a law which bans the sale of birds within the UK
